short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An automation tool that assists with data migration from Didik Digital database.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to assist teachers in transferring merit data from the Didik Digital database to KPM's Sistem Sahsiah Diri Murid (SSDM), streamlining the process and eliminating the need for manual data entry.
